pullrequest.title: Learn Gazebo Visual Plugins for Ocean Reflections

content.raw:
Looking through a couple dozen photos, the refraction looks very negligible. The reflection is the only effect. Also, in most cases, the reflections keep a pretty similar in color to the original object, but often more distorted. In lower light, there is little reflection at all

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2688242677-image.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1187866503-image.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/809891810-image.png)
![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/3871952309-image.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2776781596-image.png)

Looking through a couple dozen photos, the refraction looks very negligible. The reflection is the only effect. Also, in most cases, the reflections keep a pretty similar in color to the original object, but often more distorted. In lower light, there is little reflection at all
